courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
description: Introduction to basic dance techniques and stylistic work in the jazz idiom for experienced dancers. Emphasis on a conceptual understanding of jazz style (as related to America's own cultural diversity) and the development of the specific skills necessary for performance and teaching. May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
label: Int Jazz Technique
